title.value: only 12.04 LTS: LXDE / Lubuntu: switch keyboard layout (LXKeymap)

body.value:
Only needed for Lubuntu 12.04 LTS, in lubuntu 14.04 LTS keybaord layit switching works well without:
Lubuntu / LXDE comes without no tool to switch keyboard layout. With the tool lxkeymap it can be solved easily.
Execute in a terminal: sudo apt-get install lxkeymap (Enter)
Open in menu "settings" -> Lxkeymap
There is a known bug in 12.04 LTS which does not allow to use several keyboard layouts in parallel. Just open Lxkeymap, switch keyboard etc.
In 14.04 LTS ff. this bug is fixed and Lxkeymap not needed.
